body:
Does anybody know a way to make it that when people die they spawn in the world they were in and not the hub? since I am using one server only (yes this is for my server which should be up by september)

And before saying search it up on the internet, I already did that, all I found was some useless plugin that is exactly like /warp [warp name]

Thanks for the support

Vlad :3

title: Different world spawn? (server help)
